00091 #include "LRU_List.h"
00092 #include "log_functions.h"
00093 #include "HashData.h"
00094 #include "HashTable.h"
00095 #include "fsal.h"
00096 #include "cache_inode.h"
00097 #include "stuff_alloc.h"

00099 #include <unistd.h>
00100 #include <sys/types.h>
00101 #include <sys/param.h>
00102 #include <time.h>
00103 #include <pthread.h>
00104 
00122 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_lookupp_sw( cache_entry_t        * pentry,
00123                                         hash_table_t         * ht,  
00124                                         cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00125                                         fsal_op_context_t    * pcontext, 
00126                                         cache_inode_status_t * pstatus,
00127                                         int use_mutex )
00128 {
00129   cache_entry_t         * pentry_parent = NULL ;
00130   fsal_status_t           fsal_status ;
00131   fsal_attrib_list_t      object_attributes ;
00132   cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsdata ;
00133 
00134   /* Set the return default to CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS */
00135   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00136 
00137   /* stats */
00138   pclient->stat.nb_call_total += 1 ;
00139   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00140   
00141   /* The entry should be a directory */
00142   if( use_mutex )
00143     P( pentry->lock ) ;
00144   if(  pentry->internal_md.type != DIR_BEGINNING )
00145     {
00146       if( use_mutex )
00147         V( pentry->lock ) ;
00148       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_BAD_TYPE ;
00149 
00150       /* stats */
00151       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUPP] += 1 ;
00152   
00153       return NULL ;
00154     }
00155   
00156   /* Renew the entry (to avoid having it being garbagged */
00157   if( cache_inode_renew_entry( pentry, NULL, ht, pclient, pcontext, pstatus ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00158     {
00159       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_GETATTR] += 1 ;
00160       return NULL ;
00161     }
00162 
00163   /* Does the parent belongs to the cache ? */
00164   if( pentry->parent_list->parent != NULL )
00165     {
00166       /* YES, the parent is cached, use the pentry that we have found */
00167       pentry_parent = pentry->parent_list->parent ;
00168     }
00169   else
00170     {
00171       /* NO, the parent is not cached, query FSAL to get it and cache the result */
00172       object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask ;
00173       fsal_status= FSAL_lookup( &pentry->object.dir_begin.handle, &FSAL_DOT_DOT, pcontext, &fsdata.handle, &object_attributes ) ;
00174       
00175       if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00176         {
00177           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00178           if( use_mutex )
00179             V( pentry->lock ) ;
00180          
00181            /* Stale File Handle to be detected and managed */
00182           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00183             {
00184                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00185 
00186                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_lookupp: Stale FSAL FH detected for pentry %p", pentry ) ;
00187 
00188                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ) 
00189                   DisplayLog( "cache_inode_remove: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00190 
00191                 *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00192             }
00193 
00194  
00195           /* stats */
00196           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUPP] += 1 ;
00197 
00198           return NULL ;
00199         }
00200 
00201       /* Call cache_inode_get to populate the cache with the parent entry */
00202       fsdata.cookie = 0 ;
00203 
00204       if( ( pentry_parent = cache_inode_get( &fsdata, 
00205                                              &object_attributes, 
00206                                              ht,
00207                                              pclient,
00208                                              pcontext,
00209                                              pstatus ) ) == NULL ) 
00210         {
00211           if( use_mutex )
00212             V( pentry->lock ) ;
00213           
00214           /* stats */
00215           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUPP] += 1 ;
00216           
00217           return NULL ;
00218         }
00219     }
00220   
00221   
00222   *pstatus =  cache_inode_valid( pentry_parent, CACHE_INODE_OP_GET, pclient ) ;
00223   if( use_mutex )
00224     V( pentry->lock ) ;
00225 
00226   /* stat */
00227   if( *pstatus != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00228     pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUPP] += 1 ;
00229   else
00230     pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_success[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUPP] += 1 ;
00231   
00232   return pentry_parent ;
00233 } /* cache_inode_lookupp_sw */
00234  
00251 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_lookupp( cache_entry_t        * pentry,
00252                                      hash_table_t         * ht,  
00253                                      cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00254                                      fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext, 
00255                                      cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00256 {
00257   return cache_inode_lookupp_sw( pentry, 
00258                                  ht, 
00259                                  pclient, 
00260                                  pcontext, 
00261                                  pstatus, 
00262                                  TRUE ) ;
00263 } /* cache_inode_lookupp_sw */
00264 
00281 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_lookupp_no_mutex( cache_entry_t        * pentry,
00282                                               hash_table_t         * ht,  
00283                                               cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00284                                               fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext, 
00285                                               cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00286 {
00287   return cache_inode_lookupp_sw( pentry, 
00288                                  ht, 
00289                                  pclient, 
00290                                  pcontext, 
00291                                  pstatus, 
00292                                  FALSE ) ;
00293 } /* cache_inode_lookupp_no_mutex */
